channel.title: Multiple-scattering on Artur L Gower
channel.description: Recent content in Multiple-scattering on Artur L Gower

item.title: Characterising particulate random media from near-surface backscattering: A machine learning approach to predict particle size and concentration
Multiple Scattering
item.description: I am currently working on multiply scattering in random media. See example video below! I develop methods to calculate the ensemble average of the wave, which I compare with numerical benchmarks based on the multipole method. Back-scattering from a random arrangement of particles.
